channel.title: Comments on: The Brain is a Crazy, Curious, Marvelous Thing – Thursday, June 29

item.title: By: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.dc:creator: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.description: How wonderful that you are improving so much. I am working hard to get my strength back. I am not quite there yet. I am looking at Tuesday, July 11th or Thursday, the 13th to drive out to see you. I will confirm with you on Monday next. I am staying home tomorrow and watching the fireworks on the TV. I hope you can see the festivities too. You remain in my prayers everyday. Love, Debbie
item.content:encoded:
How wonderful that you are improving so much. I am working hard to get my strength back. I am not quite there yet. I am looking at Tuesday, July 11th or Thursday, the 13th to drive out to see you. I will confirm with you on Monday next. I am staying home tomorrow and watching the fireworks on the TV. I hope you can see the festivities too.
You remain in my prayers everyday. Love, Debbie
